JobTitle: Virtual Engineer I, Kabbage Data Platform
JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back. 

At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways.  Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible - and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day. 
Kabbage, a leading FinTech innovator, was recently acquired by American Express. We’re looking to grow our engineering team to continue building upon our innovative Kabbage platform as we launch new products and deepen relationships with small business owners.
What you'll be doing:  


Play a critical role in the development, design, and maintenance of Kabbage's large-scale distributed data platform. 


Analyze complex data systems and the flow, relationships, and dependencies of our data to contribute to conceptual, logical, and physical data models. 


Continuously improve the accuracy, availability, accessibility, and consistency of data necessary for analytical and data science workloads 


Work across the engineering organization to utilize our data platform to deliver value for Kabbage products. 




Provide support for consumers of our data platform and educate them on best practices for utilizing our data platform to solve business problems. 


What we're looking for in you:  


Proactivity: Resourceful, has grit, and a positive “can do” attitude; acts without being told what to do.  


Communication: Communicates information, ideas, and concepts clearly.  


Teamwork: Reaches out to peers and cooperates with supervisors to establish an overall collaborative working relationship. 




High Standards: Expects personal performance and team performance to be nothing short of the best. 


Analytical skills: Likes learning and learns quickly.




Strong experience in python, spark, and T-SQL 


Understanding and interest in architectural patterns for highly available, scalable, distributed data systems. 




Experience with unstructured data (json, xml) 


Experience with cloud technology like AWS, Azure, or GCP 


Understanding of data modeling for highly transactional applications 


Experience with a streaming technology like Kafka or Amazon Kinesis 


Three or more years of relevant experience
